name: Obsidian Indra Sigil
description: A Sigil honoring the Boltor, a Tenno classic.

languages.description: Ein Siegel, das die Boltor ehrt, ein gern genutzter Klassiker der Tenno.
languages.name: Siegel: Obsidian Indra

languages.description: Un Sceau honorant le Boltor, un classique Tenno.
languages.name: Sceau Indra Obsidienne

languages.description: Un sigillo in onore del Boltor, un classico dei Tenno.
languages.name: Sigillo Indra Obsidian

languages.description: Un sello en honor a la Boltor, un clásico de los tenno.
languages.name: Sello Indra de Obsidiana

languages.description: 向 Tenno 的经典武器——螺钉步枪致敬的一枚纹章。
languages.name: 黑曜石因陀罗纹章

languages.description: Сигил, созданный в честь Болтора - классики Тэнно.
languages.name: Сигил: Индра Обсидиан

languages.description: テンノ伝統のBoltorを称したシジル。
languages.name: Obsidian Indra シジル

languages.description: Znak honorujący Boltora, jedną z klasycznych broni Tenno.
languages.name: Znak Indra Obsydianowy

languages.description: Um brasão em homenagem à Boltor, uma clássica arma Tenno.
languages.name: Brasão: Indra de Obsidiana

languages.description: 向螺釘步槍──Tenno 的經典武器致敬的一枚紋章。
languages.name: 黑曜石印德拉紋章

languages.description: เครื่องหมายแสดงการให้เกียรติ Boltor อาวุธคลาสสิกของ Tenno
languages.name: เครื่องหมาย: Obsidian Indra

languages.description: Bir Tenno klasiği olan Boltor'u onurlandıran bir Mühür.
languages.name: Obsidian Indra Mührü
